p: The environmental surveillance for HEV started within the framework of the 2011–2016 European Project PREDEMICS (Preparedness, prediction, and prevention of emerging zoonotic viruses with pandemic potential using multidisciplinary approaches - https://predemics.biomedtrain.eu/cms/). After that, the surveillance continued with the 2017–2019 national project “Hepatitis E, an emerging problem in food safety: ‘One Health’ approach for risk assessment” (CCM 2016 program) financed by the Italian Ministry of Health.
